failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given Open the Salesforce Website...........................................undefined When verify the Salesforce page title as "Login | Salesforce"...............undefined Then Login with valid username and password "vedant.jagani@campingworld.com.test" and "Welcome2019*".undefined And Click login button......................................................undefined And Verify Salesforce Home page title as "Home | Salesforce"................undefined Then Click on the Opportunities tab.........................................undefined Then Click on the New button................................................undefined Then Select a record type and click Next....................................undefined Then Verify Required fields message.........................................undefined Then Save button............................................................undefined And Populate System Admin Layout fields.....................................undefined And Opportunity Information.................................................undefined And Interested In Attributes................................................undefined And Interested In Details...................................................undefined And Towing Information......................................................undefined And Currently Own Trade-InCurrently Own TradeIn from Web Lead fields........undefined And Populate Info from lead fields..........................................undefined And Lead Source.............................................................undefined And Enter the Description Information.......................................undefined And Other data fields.......................................................undefined And System Information fields...............................................undefined Then Click the Save button..................................................undefined
